sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './checkout.styles.scss' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import {createStructuredSelector} from 'reselect' import CeckoutItem from '../../components/checkout-item/checkout-item.component' import {selectCartItems} from '../../redux/cart/cart.selectors' import {selectCartTotal} from '../../redux/cart/cart.selectors' const CheckoutPage = ({cartItems,total}) => (
PRODUCT
DESCRIPTION
Quantity
PRICE
REMOVE
{ cartItems.map(cartItem => cartItem.name ) }
TOTAL: ${total}
) const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ cartItems: selectCartItems, total: selectCartTotal }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(CheckoutPage)
